import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import apiService from '../APIservice' import UserMini from '../search-minis/user-mini/user-mini' import './trades.css' function TradesTab () { const [area, changeArea] = useState('') const [users, changeUsers] = useState([]) function handleChange(e) { changeArea(e.target.value) } useEffect(()=> { async function findTrades () { const res = await apiService.findTrades(area) changeUsers(res) } findTrades() },[area]) return (

Browse Trades

{area && users.map(u => < UserMini key={u.username} u={u}/>) }
) } export default TradesTab
